This traditional Middle Eastern salad not only delights with its
vibrant presentation but also satisfies with its refreshing taste
and crunchy textures. Whether enjoyed on its own or as a
complement to your main course, our fatoush salad offers a
refreshing and nutritious addition to your dining experience.

Whether you're a longtime fan or new to Middle Eastern
cuisine, our falafel plate promises a satisfying, authentic taste
that embodies the essence of traditional recipes passed down
through generations.

Address: 865 W Eisenhower Pkwy, Ann Arbor, MI 48103
Description: Menus featuring traditional Mediterranean fare with small & shared plates & outdoor tables.

summary.snippet: "Quaint little restaurant with amazing food and friendly service."
"The ginger hummus and fulful (spicy) hummus are always packed with flavor!"
"The gentlemen who work there are the sweetest people!"

most_relevant.description: I'm really picky about my Mediterranean style food and this is so good! Served quickly. Great service also. I came in for takeout and was offered fresh delicious cinnamon tea while I waited. I will definitely be back here!
Great dinner very filling. Fast service and kind staff!

First time here.
We came here for the Persian kabob and it did not disappoint.
The lentil soup was delicious and well-seasoned. The rice was fresh and tasty. The Koobideh kabob was freshly made and seasoned well.
We ordered saffron and cinnamon tea, both were good but the cinnamon one became my favorite.

The place is nice and cozy and the staff is friendly.
Overall it was a really good experience and will definitely come back.
I highly recommend Zamaan Cafe.

Authentic, flavorful and fresh food! Their hummus is some of my favorite in the area. The ginger hummus and fulful (spicy) hummus are always packed with flavor! I love their falafel wraps and stuffed grape leaves, and their chicken tawook is tender and so tasty. You can’t go wrong with anything on their menu!

I made this place my go to when I come to Ann Arbor. The first several times was really good service and really good food. BUT yesterday was the worst I’ve ever experienced it. We walked in, and I immediately smelled a stench that smelled like something rotten. The waitress was not the usual lady we see, and she was not only slow, she was inattentive. We walked in to her eating and said we could sit down anywhere. The tables were all dirty. She brought me the water with lemon and the lemon seemed to be old and squishy. The food did not taste fresh like it always had, spicy hummus was hardly spicy, and my food did not taste the same (I always get the same thing). I’m not sure if it was a different cook during that time or what, but overall I was disappointed. In the end, we were waiting on the server to ask us if we needed anything and to bring the check, we were obviously done eating. She was cleaning every last table and salt n pepper shaker in the entire place before my friend went up to ask for the things we needed. Highly disappointed in the service we received yesterday and incredibly grossed out over the smell of the building and the quality of freshness with our food. I won’t be going back bcuz if it’s like that ever again, I’d be wasting my time and money..

Very kind and fast service on takeout.  Problem is I compare to Woody's Mediterranean which is a 5++ every time. I ordered the falafel sandwich. Another reviewer praised the crunchy bread wrap, but I found it cooked the lettuce and sandwich was rather dry and lacking flavor. Add some pickled turnip and some sauce! Where was the garlic? I guess the price was okay for this area. I'd still go back here to try other items based on other reviews, but have to travel to EL for a falafel sandwich.

This place was great. The food was top notch. So was the service. Service was on a level of a high end steakhouse. You order at a kiosk then take a seat. After that it is like a full service restaurant. I ordered the Shia Tawook. Lentil soup. And extra garlic sauce. Definitely recommend this place.

Really good food, dessert, tea and service!! Everything was fresh and delicious. The restaurant was very clean. Big parking lot. They also remember your name!! For sure will be back soon!! Thanks Ali, see you next time!! 😊
